plot: One has to do art is a documentary that follows Bolivian artists who share their experiences and address the issue of making art and its importance in society.
title: Hay Que Hacer Arte
plot_es: One has to do art is a documentary that follows Bolivian artists who share their experiences and address the issue of making art and its importance in society.
plot_en: One has to do art is a documentary that follows Bolivian artists who share their experiences and address the issue of making art and its importance in society.
